comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Probably the Bufffalo lawyer of this name who was named in the NYT of Jan 22, 1916 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60C10FB355C1373... as likely to be appointed the New York State Superindent of Prisons after the incumbent was removed from office by Governor Whitman. The evening world., January 22, 1916, Final Edition, page 2 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030193/1916-01-22/ed-... confirms the identification with a picture. I haven't yet been able to confirm that he did get the post.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The evening world., March 22, 1916, Final Edition, page 1, column 2 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030193/1916-03-22/ed-... announces the confirmation of a James M. Carter of Buffalo to the position.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the information and links! We can add to the description when we next update.
